item.title: Report X-2024101210
item.description:
Report X-2024101210

Identified by scraper @ 2024-10-22T09:15:04+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-10-08
  • City: SPARKS
  • State: NV
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDER WAS CALLED UP TO B SIDE SORT AISLE FOR LEAKING PACKAGE. WENT TO SORT AISLE TO GRAB LEAKER THERE WAS NO LIQUID JUST GLASS AND STAINED PACKAGE. CAME BACK TO DMP TO PROCESS NOTICED 1 BROKEN BOTTLE AND 3 OTHER HAMZMAT BOTTLES IN PACKAGE, DICHLOROMETHANE / ACETONITRILE / TOLUENE / ACETIC ACID, GLACIAL. DAMAGE INSPECTION; LEAKER - DICHLOROMETHANE LEAKED, UNDECLARED.

item.title: Report X-2024101045
item.description:
Report X-2024101045

Identified by scraper @ 2024-10-18T06:17:57+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-10-09
  • City: SPARKS
  • State: NV
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: RESPONDER WAS NOTIFIED BY SUPERVISOR OF LEAKING PACKAGE ON IRREG BELT. GRABBED SPILL CART AND WENT TO IREG BELT TO GRAB LEAKER. NOTICED IT WAS A HAZMAT AND THE BOTTOM OF BOX WAS WET. PUT LEAKER IN SPILL TRAY AND CLEANED UP SPILLAGE FROM BOX. TOOK BACK TO DMP TO PROCESS LEAKER
